=Portable Executable 101 - a windows executable walkthrough=

This graphic ([http://corkami.googlecode.com/files/PE101-v1.pdf PDF] [http://corkami.googlecode.com/files/PE101-v1.jpg JPG]) is a walkthrough of a *[http://corkami.googlecode.com/files/PE101.zip simple windows executable]*, that shows its dissected structure and explains how it's loaded by the operating system.

https://corkami.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pics/pe101-preview.jpg

this file was *entirely written by hand* to be concise (standard PEs contain more informations that are not essential for such a first introduction).

https://corkami.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pics/simple_executable.png
